member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.Tiff.TiffDirEntry
member.summary: TIFF Image File Directories are comprised of a table of field descriptors of the form shown below. The table is sorted in ascending order by tag. The values associated with each entry are disjoint and may appear anywhere in the file (so long as they are placed on a word boundary). If the value is 4 bytes or less, then it is placed in the offset field to save space. If the value is less than 4 bytes, it is left-justified in the offset field.

member.summary: Operation was successful.

member.summary: May be returned by any operation. An error has occurred.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwRC.CheckStatus
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_CAPABILITY and DAT_IMAGELAYOUT. Operation failed to completely perform the desired operation. For example, setting ICAP_BRIGHTNESS to 3 when its range is -1000 to 1000 with a step of 200. The data source may opt to set the value to 0 and return this status.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwRC.Cancel
member.summary: Intended for use with the DAT_IMAGE*XFER operations. Operation has been canceled.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwRC.DSEvent
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_EVENT. The data source processed the event.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwRC.NotDSEvent
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_EVENT. The data source did not process the event.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwRC.XferDone
member.summary: Intended for use with the DAT_IMAGE*XFER operations. The image has been fully transferred.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwRC.EndOfList
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_IDENTITY and DAT_FILESYSTEM.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwRC.InfoNotSupported
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_EXTIMAGEINFO. The requested TWEI_ data is either not supported by this data source, or is not supported for this particular image.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwRC.DataNotAvailable
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_EXTIMAGEINFO. There is no data available for the requested TWEI_ item.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwRC.Busy
member.summary: The busy.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwRC.ScannerLocked
member.summary: The scanner locked.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwCC
member.summary: Condition Codes

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.Success
member.summary: Operation was successful. This value should only be paired with TWRC_SUCCESS.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.Bummer
member.summary: May be returned by any operation. The data source is in a critical state.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.LowMemory
member.summary: May be returned for any operation except ones that reduce state (DAT_PENDINGXFERS / MSG_ENDXER, DAT_PENDINGXFERS / MSG_RESET, DAT_USERINTERFACE / MSG_DISABLEDS, DAT_IDENTITY / MSG_CLOSEDS, DAT_PARENT / MSG_CLOSEDSM).

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.NoDS
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_IDENTITY / MSG_OPENDS. The device is not online.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.MaxConnections
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_IDENTITY / MSG_OPENDS. The data source cannot support any more connections to this device.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.OperationError
member.summary: The operation failed, but the user has already been informed by the data source.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.BadCap
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_CAPABILITY. Returned by pre-1.7 data sources to indicate that the capability is not supported, that the value was bad, or that the desired value could not be set at this time.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.BadProtocol
member.summary: May be returned by any operation. The requested DG_* / DAT_* / MSG_* is not supported by the data source.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.BadValue
member.summary: May be returned by any operation. The capability or operation has rejected the requested setting.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.SeqError
member.summary: The seq error.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.BadDest
member.summary: May be returned by any operation (save for the DAT_PARENT operations). The TW_IDENTITY for the destination (the data source) does not match any items opened by MSG_OPENDS.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.CapUnsupported
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_CAPABILITY. The capability is not supported.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.CapBadOperation
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_CAPABILITY. The capability does not support the requested operation.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.CapSeqError
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_CAPABILITY. The capability being MSG_SET or MSG_RESET cannot be modified due to a setting for a related capability. For instance, this may be returned by ICAP_CITTKFACTOR if ICAP_COMPRESSION is set to any value other than TWCP_GROUP32D.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.Denied
member.summary: Intended for DAT_IMAGEFILEXFER and DAT_FILESYSTEM, the specified file or directory cannot be modified or deleted.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.FileExists
member.summary: Intended for DAT_FILESYSTEM. The specified file or directory already exists.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.FileNotFound
member.summary: Intended for DAT_IMAGEFILEXFER and DAT_FILESYSTEM. The specified file or directory cannot be found.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.NotEmpty
member.summary: Intended for use with DAT_FILESYSTEM. Directory is in use, and cannot be deleted.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.PaperJam
member.summary: Intended for use with the DAT_IMAGE*XFER operations.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCC.PaperDoubleFeed
member.summary: Intended for use with the DAT_IMAGE*XFER operations.

member.summary: Returns the capability to its TWAIN Default (power-on) condition (i.e. all previous negotiation is ignored).

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwQC.SetConstraint
member.summary: Allows the application to set the Current and Default value(s) and restrict the Available values to some subset of the Source’s power-on set of values. Sources are strongly encouraged to allow the application to set as many of its capabilities as possible, and further to reflect these changes in the Source’s user interface. This will ensure that the user can only select images with characteristics that are useful to the consuming application.
